Room.Name: Evander's Poles and Polearms
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Polearms Shop in Evander's World of Weapons center.
Room.LongDescription: You can see a number of large pole weapons on display here, including some strange ones you might not have seen before. Most pole weapons consist of a long, wooden pole, topped with a large metal blade. Variaties of the blades make some weapons better than others for certain types of battles.
